select
from cost_zh where supplier_id =#{supplierId} and reporting_period =#{reportingPeriod} order by cz_id

mapper.select: select cz_id from cost_zh where reporting_period = #{yearMonth} and certificate_number = #{certificateNumber}
mapper.update:
update cost_zh set pension_radix = #{pensionRadix}, pension_company_pay = #{pensionCompanyPay}, pension_person_pay = #{pensionPersonPay},
unemployment_radix = #{unemploymentRadix}, unemployment_company_pay = #{unemploymentCompanyPay}, unemployment_person_pay = #{unemploymentPersonPay},
injury_company_radix = #{injuryCompanyRadix}, injury_company_pay = #{injuryCompanyPay}, injury_person_pay = #{injuryPersonPay},
procreate_company_radix = #{procreateCompanyRadix}, procreate_company_pay = #{procreateCompanyPay}, procreate_person_pay = #{procreatePersonPay},

company_total = #{companyTotal}, person_total = #{personTotal}, social_security_total = #{socialSecurityTotal} where reporting_period = #{reportingPeriod} and certificate_number = #{certificateNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT s.s_id, s.supplier_name, cz.reporting_period, sum(cz.social_security_total+cz.accumulation_fund_total) gongsiHeji, sum(cz.social_security_total) shebaoHeji, sum(cz.accumulation_fund_company_pay) gongjijinGongsi, sum(cz.accumulation_fund_person_pay) gongjijinGeren, sum(cz.accumulation_fund_total) gongjijinHeji FROM cost_zh cz,supplier s WHERE s.s_id = cz.supplier_id AND cz.reporting_period = #{yearMonth} GROUP BY supplier_id

SELECT
FROM cost_zh WHERE reporting_period = #{yearMonth} AND supplier_id = #{supplierId}
